title: 72A.38 SEVERABILITY.
text: If any provision of sections 72A.33 to 72A.39 or the application thereof to any person or circumstances is held invalid, such invalidity shall not affect other provisions or application of sections 72A.33 to 72A.39 which can be given effect without the invalid provision or application, and to this end the provisions of sections 72A.33 to 72A.39 are declared to be severable.
